product.name: CoverGirl LashBlast Fusion Mascara
product.description:
Experience COVERGIRL's first ever volume + length mascara!The 
fiberstretch formula and oversized brush make every little lash bigger, 
fuller, longer -looking and more dramatic.* 							                     
       	
                                *vs bare lashesFeatures: Super-Volumizing + Buildable fiber-strength lengtheningThickens and extends the look of your natural lashes
